text: Alberto Bozzato was a rower from Italy. Bozzato competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born on 8 April 1930 and died on 18 June 2022.Alberto Bozzato == References == Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian rowers Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Venice
title: Alberto Bozzato
